statements: UPDATE budget_tracking SET budget_amount = 5000.00 WHERE budget_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE budget_tracking SET start_date = '2022-01-01', budget_name = 'Quarterly Budget' WHERE budget_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678' AND customer_id = '98765432-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
